title: AIEGO v0.8
description: Z-Image Turbo endpoint with FaceDetailer, Upscale, and CRT Post-Processing
readme:
# AIEGO - Z-Image Turbo Endpoint

Fast image generation with optional FaceDetailer and Upscaling.

## Input Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Default | Description |
|-----------|------|---------|-------------|
| prompt | string | required | Image description |
| negative | string | "bad quality, blurry" | Negative prompt |
| width | int | 1024 | Image width (512-2048) |
| height | int | 1024 | Image height (512-2048) |
| seed | int | random | Reproducibility seed |
| loraName | string | null | LoRA filename |
| loraStrength | float | 0.7 | LoRA strength |
| useFaceDetailer | bool | false | Enable face enhancement |
| useUpscale | bool | false | Enable upscaling |
| upscaleFactor | float | 1.5 | Upscale multiplier |
| pp | object | {} | Post-processing options |

## Example Request

```json
{
  "input": {
    "prompt": "a beautiful woman in a red dress",
    "width": 1024,
    "height": 1024,
    "useFaceDetailer": true
  }
}
```
